de.uniba.wiai.kinf.lehre.ma13.view.interfaces

Interface ICanvas

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Canvas

    public interface ICanvas

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTempGeometry(DrawGeometry tempDrawGeometry, IGeometry tempGeometry, boolean stack)
      as paint() is called asynchronously, use this method to add temporary geometries which should be drawn after clearing/repainting the canvas.
      void clearTempGeometries()
      clears all temporary geometries
      java.awt.Rectangle getCanvasClippingBounds()
      returns the bounds of the current clipping at the canvas if the zoom is 100%, it would return (0, 0, imagewidth, imageheight)
      java.awt.Graphics getGraphics()
      returns the graphics component
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
      (re)paint the canvas with the current state.
      void repaint()
      trigger a repaint of the canvas
      void setBackgroundDrawer(DrawGeometry drawBackground)
      sets a template for drawing the background
      void setGeometryDrawer(DrawGeometry drawGeometry)
      set a template for drawing different geometries
      void setMouseAction(MouseAction mouseAction)
      adds a specific mouse listener to the canvas

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        (re)paint the canvas with the current state. Will invoke the controller.

      • repaint

        void repaint()
        trigger a repaint of the canvas

      • setGeometryDrawer

        void setGeometryDrawer(DrawGeometry drawGeometry)
        set a template for drawing different geometries

      • setBackgroundDrawer

        void setBackgroundDrawer(DrawGeometry drawBackground)
        sets a template for drawing the background

      • setMouseAction

        void setMouseAction(MouseAction mouseAction)
        adds a specific mouse listener to the canvas

      • getGraphics

        java.awt.Graphics getGraphics()
        returns the graphics component

      • addTempGeometry

        void addTempGeometry(DrawGeometry tempDrawGeometry,
                   IGeometry tempGeometry,
                   boolean stack)
        as paint() is called asynchronously, use this method to add temporary geometries which should be drawn after clearing/repainting the canvas. Use the DrawGeometry algorithm and add the geometry to the list. NOTE: If the last element in the list should be replaced, set "stack" to false!

      • clearTempGeometries

        void clearTempGeometries()
        clears all temporary geometries

      • getCanvasClippingBounds

        java.awt.Rectangle getCanvasClippingBounds()
        returns the bounds of the current clipping at the canvas if the zoom is 100%, it would return (0, 0, imagewidth, imageheight)
